answers.answer: Hi!Weight gain during a normal pregnancy varies from 25 to 35 pounds. So a gain of 27-28 pounds is considered normal weight gain. However, if you have problems like diabetes, high blood pressure etc, your doctor may watch your weight more strictly. Do discuss this with your doctor. Take care!

Thank you for ur feedback. i am healthy with no health issues thank God. i just dnt do well with gaining weight...my doc says its ok but i was thinkin maybe he just Didnt want to make me worry...i plan on breastfeeding so i know that helps with losing the weight. just 14 more days n ill be holding my angel! Again, thank u n God bless!!

question: I am 37 weeks pregnant n Im having a scheduled c-section at 39weeks. i have gained about 27-28 lbs. i started out at 154 lbs...have i gained too much?
title: weight gain at 37 weeks
